name: v1.1.0
body:
* e966df3 Upgrade fasthttp to v1.3.0 and other dependencies (Sergio Andres Virviescas Santana)
* f82f1ce Fix data inconsistencies when cookie expires (Sergio Andres Virviescas Santana)
* 1e3835d Move constant to const file and make expirationChanged thread safe. (Clement Michaud)
* 6afe152 Fix session expiration of Redis and Memcache. (Clement Michaud)
* 88c6fa6 Fix some bugs regarding stored expiration. (Clement Michaud)
* b422884 Set expiration per session. (Clement Michaud)
* 6bd7fb4 Set new cookie in request when cookie is regenerated. (Clement Michaud)
* efbf544 Improve not GC when expires is 0 in memory provider (Sergio Andres Virviescas Santana)
* 91a2724 Allow setting cookie secure flag when server is behing a proxy (Clement Michaud)
*   a591cf5 Merge pull request #8 from fasthttp/bugfix/SessionExpiration (Sergio Andrés Virviescas Santana)
|\  
| * a78ede3 Not GC if expires is 0 (Sergio Andres Virviescas Santana)
| * c9d4148 Remove unnecessary SessionLifeTime config and use Expires (Sergio Andres Virviescas Santana)
|/  
* 1f4f9f4 Add support to go 1.12 (Sergio Andres Virviescas Santana)
